titleStmt.title: A remonstrance from His Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax, and his Councell of Warre, concerning the late discontent and distraction in the Army. With his Excellencies declaration of himselfe, and expectation from the Army thereupon, for the future uniting of the Army. Published by his Excellency at the head of every regiment, at the first randezvouze of the Army in Cork-bush Field between Hartford and Ware, Munday Novemb. 15. 1647. By the appointment of his Excellency, and the Councell of Warre, signed, John Rushworth, Secr. Novembr. 16. Imprimatur, Gilb. Mabbot.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army. Council.
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for George Whittington, at the Blew Anchor in Cornhill neere the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Blew Anchor in Cornhill neere the Royall Exchange
